candidates.reason: The topic discusses repeated answers without providing new information, whereas the comment talks about adjusting speed and controlling a motor with no apparent connection to the topic.
candidates.comment: He uses a 5k Pot to adjust the speed the three lights will alternate by powering with 12 volts and using three mosfets. Using the three mosfets and the pot to control a cd rom motor was really interesting. The oscilloscope shows how smooth the motor was running and he could even increase the speed to a very high RPM.
